channel.title: IP question
channel.description:
I am here for more Help.
I have my client and server, "Which work" but i want to change the IP
I know what the IP will be (none of your bizness) but can i just change the ip from
127.0.0.1 to MYIPNONEOFYOUBIZNESS will that just work?
Where do i change the IP (what files)
Btw my server is a 474 don't know what's its name is ..... like "Delta" or "Project Insanity"

item.title: IP question
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You need to portforward and also setup a No-IP ip address. Then you can connect to your server without using localhost. You’ll have to find the file in the client to change the IP to the one you setup yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: IP question
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

You can go into your client.java file and search server and replace it there think i haven’t used delta but project insanity is what i use.

Read full topic
